title: Bug 22352[Navigator] Copying outofsync resource over existing deletes existing and aborts copy
description: Bug 22352[Navigator] Copying outofsync resource over existing deletes existing and aborts copy From bug 20646:"I selected several files to be copied from one folder to another. The targetfolder already had files of the same name. When I pasted the files into thetarget folder, I was prompted to overwrite an existing file.[... ]...some of the resources I was coping were outofsync with the local filesystem so the operation failed and all the conflicting files in the targetfolder were deleted but no resources were copied.
EB: "Should not delete files in the target folder unless they will actually bereplaced by the source.
